text: Highway 11, is a highway that starts at the USA border and ends at Highway 7 near Downtown Mission, British Columbia. The Mission Bridge has 4 lanes (2 lanes per direction). The Mission Bridge was finished at June 1973. Highway 11 goes north/south route and all exits are unnumbered. The exits are British Columbia Highway 1, Old Yale Rd (Abbotsford) (No southbound exit), Old Clayburn Road, Riverside Street (Southbound only) and London Avenue or Horne Street/Harbour Avenue. During the floods, some of the roads were damaged since November 2021. ==References== Category:British Columbia provincial highways Category:Trans-Canada Highway
title: British Columbia Highway 11
